title: Expectations
creator_credit: Jimmy Pasakos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In this initimate use of the form of Digital Storytelling, Jim Pasakos puts together this story for his child. Using second person narrative, Pasakos tells of the decision to have a baby and the processes leading up to the birth. This serves as a very personal account of childbirth and a cherished family record.
